definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: A man pulls up an anchor line in Al Aqabah Harbor, Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 在约旦亚喀巴港，一个渔人拉起一根锚链。

sentences.english: An ancient country of Palestine between the Dead Sea and the Gulf of Aqaba .
sentences.chinese: 巴勒斯坦的一个古国，位于死海与亚喀巴湾之间。

sentences.english: The Gulf of Suez and the Gulf of Aqaba extend from the Red Sea toward the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: 在苏伊士湾和亚喀巴湾延伸从红海向地中海。

sentences.english: There is also the Dead Sea, and Aqaba , where we have an incredible Coral Reef!
sentences.chinese: 还有死海，还有亚喀巴港，那里有不可思议的珊瑚礁。

sentences.english: Soldier B: Tip of the Red Sea, Gulf of Aqaba.
sentences.chinese: 红海的要地，亚喀巴海湾。

definition: Eilat, Israeli port and resort on the Red sea
Tabriz city in northwest Iran, capital of Iranian East Azerbaijan
Isfahan or Eşfahān, province and city in central Iran
